name: Cedarville
description:
Cedarville is a game about making immediate choices with little or no context and paying the consequences for those choices regardless of what you assume is the “correct” choice.

Do you stay at the hotel for 3 nights or 4 nights? Do you trust your co-worker with the secret password or not?

Choose wisely — you might find that Cedarville is a much smaller place than you think!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Playable on all major desktop browsers.

Special thanks to Brian Callahan ( @FuturistTeletex)
